subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey pitched a four-hitter to win his seventh straight decision, Josh Donaldson had three hits and three R.B.I., and Toronto beat the Indians, 5-1.
snippet: R. A. Dickey pitched a four-hitter to win his seventh straight decision, Josh Donaldson had three hits and three R.B.I., and Toronto beat the Indians, 5-1.
